amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for a Gulf Range Mobile Instrumentation Capability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 389 printed in Part B of House Report 111-233 to prohibit funding for a Gulf Range Mobile Instrumentation Capability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 350, 10 Present (Roll no. 666).
